name: Trash Cleaning
description:
So I made a satisfying game so all you can do is clean up trash.

CONTROLS:

w,a,s,d or arrow keys to move

Mouse or space to suck up trash

(Mouse is also used to look around)

m to shoot trash

n to shoot coins

b to shoot water

l(L) to open shop

z to skip tutorial

CONTROLS FOR MOBILE

are in the game

q to hide tag

Variables at the top:

The left variable shows how much trash you have

The right variable shows how much coins you have

The middle variable shows how much water you have

                                   How To Play

Use the mouse to look around and then use W,A,S,D or arrow keys to move around. Use space or click and hold to suck up trash or coins into your Trash Sucker. If you have enough coins in your inventory, you can buy stuff from the online shop from your IPad by pushing L. Also when you reach the plastic limit, you have to recycle it at the bottom left corner.
